Hey all does anyone know a way to get inherited fields to work inside a repeater?
My use case is I set a color in a card, and then I want to default to that color for other fields in the card, but inherited values just doesn’t seem to work?

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/guides/cms/content/fields/overview#inherited-fields>

I have similar issues with repeaters and field aliases
E.g. I move an image field in my cards repeater, into a new group and want to alias to the old location, I can’t get that to work either
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/guides/cms/content/fields/alias-mapping>
